name: Tomatoes and Gorgonzola
keywords: appetizer, side dish, gorgonzola, tomato, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 very large tomato or 2 small tomatoes
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Core tomato and slice in half. If necessary cut a thin slice off bottom so the halves will stand upright.
Sprinkle basil and pepper on tomato halves. Top with cheese.
Broil 8 to 12 minutes, depending on the size of the halves, until cheese melts and tomato is beginning to soften.
